Title: Igor
Writer: Chris McKenna, Tony Leondis (additional screenplay material), John Hoffman (additional screenplay material), Dimitri Toscas (additional screenplay material)
Actors: John Cusack, Myleene Klass, Robin Howard, Matt McKenna
Plot: Animated fable about a cliché hunchbacked evil scientist's assistant who aspires to become a scientist himself, much to the displeasure of the rest of the evil science community.
